snippet.title: Track Craft | Mixed Reality | Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Track Craft is a mixed reality game where you drive toy cars, race others, and create wild tracks using your surroundings as a part of the gameplay. 

Download Track Craft: https://vr.meta.me/s/1Ruj5Qwv8UvuXoL

What is Track Craft: 

Track Craft is a mixed reality game where you drive toy cars, race others, and create wild tracks using your surroundings as a part of the gameplay. 

Why play Track Craft:

CRAFT
Turn your surroundings into a mixed reality playground using your roomscan or one of the many virtual track pieces including crazy loops, turns, fans, flying balloons, or even UFOs.

SHARE
Share your playground with other players. Craft together, hang out, have fun and race both locally and on-line.

RACE
Dive into the 104 pre-built levels spread across 5 different worlds. Collect stars, unlock cars and skins, gather points, progress to better leagues, become the best.

REPEAT
Enjoy new tracks created by other players every day in the community section. Play in MR or jump behind the wheel for a fast paced VR racing thrill.
